description.displayText: Andrea watched our three girls for a date night and they loved her! She was on time, paid attention to detail while also being warm towards the kids who were bouncing off the walls a bit. Our oldest is type 1 diabetic and Andrea was comfortable with us giving her the basics on keeping an eye on her blood sugar, etc. Our kids are already asking when Andrea can come over again, and she's babysitting for us again soon. I definitely recommend her!

I definitely recommend her!

description.displayText: Andrea has been with our family for the past 2 years. Our children where 2 yo and 3 mo old when she started. She has become like family and both our kids are very attached to her. Unfortunately, we are moving across the country so we have to part ways. She has been great at getting the kids out of the house to do fun activities and play at the park. She's good at creating a rich friend group with other nannies in the area so the kids have been well socialized. She's thrown wonderful elaborate parties for each of their birthdays within this group. She is fluent in both English and Spanish and we are thrilled the kids have picked up some Spanish along the way. She is also is a native Brooklyner so knows the ins and outs of the city well.

description.displayText: I highly recommend hiring Andrea. She came to our rescue after a last-minute cancellation and we could not have asked for a better babysitter. She was very communicative and professional-as soon as I spoke with her, my mind was at ease because I knew my son would be in good hands. She was wonderful with my son, who was a bit nervous about meeting someone new. Andrea bonded with him immediately and they spent the evening doing all of his favorite activities. He absolutely adored her and can't wait for her to come back. Andrea is warm and playful, and you can tell that she really loves children. We found her very easy to talk to, and she was great about keeping us updated throughout the evening. She is a gem and we're thrilled to know her!

description.displayText: Andrea is a treasure. For this past year, she's been taking care of our two boys like they're her own. We never worry about them when they're with Andrea; she's extremely attentive, caring, and responsive. She also thinks a great deal about them as individuals and always wants to do what's best for each of them. She is a true pleasure to work with. We love her and so do our children!

We never worry about them when they're with Andrea; she's extremely attentive, caring, and responsive. She also thinks a great deal about them as individuals and always wants to do what's best for each of them. She is a true pleasure to work with. We love her and so do our children!

description.displayText:
Andrea came to my need at the last minute and agreed to work on a very crazy schedule. I needed to find coverage for my daughter while I was busy with a demanding project. Though we live in Westchester County for this particular project it was necessary for me to stay in the city in a hotel. Andrea made sure that my daughter was picked up at her dance program and either brought her to my office or to the hotel we were staying at. Andrea also made sure that my daughter was fed and stayed on a schedule. One day required staying late in the evening to return very early in the morning and she didn't miss a beat. 

I highly recommend Andrea and specifically to potential travelers as she navigated this situation with ease and skill. I'm very thankful that this all worked as seamlessly as it did. and Andrea was an essential part. I would absolutely hire her again she did an excellent job and eliminated a great source of potential stress.

description.displayText: Andrea has been taking care of my son since October. One of the things that I love most about her is that she treats him as if he were her own son. He lights up when she arrives and that warms my heart. Leaving him with someone that we do not know was very hard for us to do, but after meeting and working with Andrea. those fears are a thing of the past. Her duties included the cleaning of his bottles and plates, etc., changing his diapers, feeding and preparing his meals and snacks, and keeping his play area clean. From time to time she has even helped me with his laundry because let's face it sometimes we all get too busy. She also played a great role in helping me get my son off of the bottle (he is almost 2) She always has new things to do with him, such as Spanish classes at the library, taking him to his classes or the play space, the park, making play dough and because of her, he has more play dates and some new friends. She is reliable and will always come early and stay late if I need her to even if there is some place she needs to be. It is unfortunate for me that I cannot use her full time right now because we are about to give birth to our second child and now is when I will need the help the most, but I highly recommend her. Any family would be lucky to have Andrea taking care of their children. I know that mine is.

description.displayText: Andrea worked for my family while I had one toddler and another on the way, and also after the birth of our second child. She is affectionate, kind, and respectful with my children, and I knew they were in safe hands. Her duties among others included diaper changes, food preparation, baths, playing, and taking them to classes.  She also respected some stringent rules surrounding the kids    diets, and communicated closely with me to make sure she understood my desires in this area. She was willing to help out in many ways besides childcare, whether in the kitchen or with the kids' laundry, and was open to picking up extra hours whenever I was in a pinch.  One of her strengths was how she always kept the kids busy by taking them to playgrounds, fun activities, and setting up play dates of her own accord. Those play dates helped further my son's socialization skills enormously!

description.displayText: Andrea has cared for my 2-year-old daughter since she was 9-months-old. She is warm, energetic, affectionate and reliable. She has always approached each day with enthusiasm and good humor - not always the easiest task with a strong-willed toddler! My daughter adores her and is always delighted to see Andrea. Andrea would often take my daughter on play dates, trips to the park, museums and other outings. Some of Andrea's duties included diaper changes, preparing food and giving my daughter her nightly bath. Andrea was great at following instructions and schedules. Any family would be fortunate to have a sitter as wonderful as Andrea, I highly recommend her.
